page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: THERE ARE MANY ENTERTAINMENT IN BRORA SUCH AS CONCERTS AND DRAMA.ALL ORGANISED BY LOCAL PEOPLE.ONCE A YEAR CUBS,SCOUTS,BROWNIES AND GUIDES HAVE A GANGSHOW WITH SINGING,DANCING AND SKETCHES.THE CONCERT AND DRAMA PEOPLE DO A SORT OF TOUR ABOUT THE DISTRICT.THEY GO TO PLACES LIKE SKERA,GOLSPIE,DORNOCH,HELMSDALE,THURSO ,EMBO,INVERNESS AND WICK AND MANY MORE PLACES.THEY RUN RAFFLES AND GUESSING GAMES TO COLLECT MONEY.IT IS NOT EXPENSIVE TO GO TO CONCERTS ALL THE MONEY THAT THEY COLLECT GOES TO CHARITIES SUCH AS DR BARNARDOS, MENTALLY HANDICAPPED AND OLD FOLKS. IT IS NOT ONLY CONCERTS THAT ENTERTAIN PEOPLE.WE ALSO HAVE YACHING, FISHING, GOLF,FOOTBALL AND BINGO.THERE IS ALSO A BEAUTIFUL SANDY BEACH WHERE CHILDREN AND ADULTS CAN SUNBATHE AND SWIM.
